content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(12.5, 9.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric pole (position 12.5, 9.5)
- Electric pole (position 8.5, 6.5)
- Electric pole (position 13.5, 10.5)
- Electric pole (position 13.5, 12.5)
- Electric pole (position 11.5, 13.5)
- Electric pole (position 12.5, 13.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace at position(2, 0)
- Burner mining drill (position 2, 0) and a furnace at position(2, 2)
- Burner mining drill (position 2, 2) and a furnace at position(0, 2)

### Wooden chest at position(5.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position 5.5, 0.5) containing iron plates

### Lab at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position 0, 0) with no power

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to no ingredients to smelt
- Verify that you have the necessary ingredients available in the furnace before attempting to smelt items.

### Errors related to lab having no power
- Ensure that the lab is connected to a power source to enable its functionality.
